textBox.richText: During our snorkel trip to Molokini today we finally found a famous Hollywood actor. Low and behold it was Gill star fish in the Finding Nemo movie! We were so stoked! No point obtaining his autograph (the poor guy couldn’t hold a pen in his fin) so we just threw him on the grill. Didn’t know Moorish Idol made such good eating! Enough jokes aside Molokini was an absolute blast. Visibility was amazing - you could see for metres and metres!! The fish were super friendly and were pretty happy to get up close and personal with you. Other snorkelers saw a Manta Ray and a Whitetip Reef Shark. Glad we didn’t come across either of these puppies - sharks scare the bejesus out of me and we all know that Manta Rays and Australian’s don’t mix!
